headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin to create virtual buttons that respond to HTTP requests.
footerDisplay: Check the Homebridge logs to find the Event URI for each button.

name.title: Name
name.description: This name is only visible in the Homebridge logs.

port.title: Port
port.description: Incoming port the HTTP Server should listen on for incoming events. This needs to be an unused port on your Homebridge server.

items.title: Name
items.description: Friendly name for the virtual button. The plugin will generate an inbound URI from this name and output it in the Homebridge logs.
